entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sandy Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
